channel.title: repository management on Haruaki TAMADA

item.title: rrh
item.description: ðŸ—£ Overview rrh is a simple git repository manager. There are too many repositories. We love programming; however, to manage many repositories is quite hard and bothersome tasks. Therefore, we built a headquarter for managing the git repositories, named rrh. rrh manages repositories by categorizing in groups and execute git command to the groups. I know the tool ghq, manages the git repositories. However, I cannot use it for the following reasons.
